```js
const { toLog } = require("@mengkodingan/tolog");

/* 
toLog(type, text, indicatorText = default to undefined)

type: 1 = info,
      2 = success,
      3 = warning,
      4 = error
      
you can use <b>TEXT</b> for bolding the text
*/
toLog(1, "text", undefined);
toLog(3, "text", "test");
toLog(2, "aaa <b>text</b>")
```
